response.original_title: Janas – Storie di donne, telai e tesori
response.overview: A road trip in Sardinia between the past and the future, starting from the artistic and existential research of Stefania Bandinu, a Sardinian artisan-artist who lives between Bologna and the island and creates 'narrative jewels'. After thirty years, Stefania crosses Sardinia to collect fabrics that she will reinvent in her jewels, embarking on a journey back to the roots to look to the future with new eyes. From Sant'Antioco to Cagliari, from Mogoro to Ulassai, from Alghero to Nule and Orgosolo and more, meeting weavers, artists and intellectuals such as Michela Murgia, interviewed at Nurachi, and Marcello Fois, crossing ancient knowledge, craftsmanship, art and design…
response.title: Janas – Storie di donne, telai e tesori
